snippet: BOWDITCH--Phebe Alexander, died peacefully at home with her family on February 9, at the age of 82. She is survived by her children from her marriage to Peter Bowditch, Dr. Phebe Lowell Bowditch of Creswell, OR and Richard Lyon Bowditch of Brooklyn, NY. She was especially proud of her three granddaughters, Alexandra Scott and Charlotte Louise Bowditch, and Elizabeth Lowell Sibley-Bowditch. Raised in Atlanta and in Rye, NY, Phebe graduated from Vassar College in 1954. She lived most of her life in New York City where she worked for almost forty years as a realtor at Brown Harris Stevens. A member of the Cosmopolitan Club and the Essex Fox Hounds, Phebe spent most of her free time with her numerous friends, and in the company of her horses and her cat. Services will be held at 3pm on Monday, February 22nd at St. James Church at 865 Madison Avenue in New York City. 1/3
